name: Pointers Bar & Grill
description: The Carpark is good, honest, fun. The relaxed, casual environment makes it almost like having friends over to your place. The Carpark is a haven that prides itself on being easy-going and removed from the overcomplicated fads of trendy new bars. It’s a blend of non-pretentious people who are not particularly impressed by the club scene.

text_for_embedding: Pointers Bar & Grill | Nightlife | The Carpark is good, honest, fun. The relaxed, casual environment makes it almost like having friends over to your place. The Carpark is a haven that prides itself on being easy-going and removed from the overcomplicated fads of trendy new bars. It’s a blend of non-pretentious people who are not particularly impressed by the club scene.
